text: María Dussauge Ortiz (born 2 August 1937), commonly known as María Duval, is a Mexican actress and singer. She was of the stars from the Golden Age of Mexican cinema. Duval was born in Querétaro, Mexico. Her career lasted from 1955 until 1995. ==Movies== *The Life of Agustín Lara (1959) *The Living Coffin (1959) *Ruletero a toda marcha (1962) *Santo vs. las Mujeres Vampiro (1962) *Tres muchachas de Jalisco (1964) *Gabino Barrera (1965) *Martín Romero El Rápido (1966) *Cada quién su lucha (1966) *Juan Colorado (1966) *La cigueña distraída (1966) * Los Bandidos (1967) *Los alegres Aguilares (1967) *La otra mujer (1972) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican singers Category:People from Querétaro
title: María Duval
